segments.text: Those kids are stealing cookies right behind her backâ€”what nerve!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's climbing on that stool like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the sink's flooding the whole kitchen; how irresponsible!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She left the water running and didn't even plug the drain properly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the floor's a mess, and she's stepping in it without a care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just egging him on, reaching for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is exactly why you can't turn your back for a second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting soaked; that's going to ruin everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she's polishing that plate while chaos brews.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is tidy, but in here it's pure anarchy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They better not break anything, or there'll be hell to pay.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids these days have no respect for rules.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm fuming just seeing this sneaky behavior.
segments.speaker: PAR
